name: 6th Edition of Euro Global Conference on Food Science and Technology
content: Magnus Group is delighted to extend the invitation to upcoming Food Science Congress 2024 the “6th Edition of the Euro-Global Conference on Food Science and Technology (FAT 2024)” from September 16-18, 2024 in Rome, Italy both Virtually and as In person whose Theme is FOOD-Focusing On Outstanding Discoveries in Food Science and Technology. Food Science And Technology Webinars 2024 will feature keynote, oral and poster presentations, as well as debates and information exchange on a variety of Food Science and Technology related topics ensures a well-rounded discussion on various aspects of food science and technology.
